name: Science Swing
description:
Extract the zip and then play HackNJam.exe.

Based in a Sci-Fi city where you have to avoid flying police cars and get to the end of the city to escape.

I made this game more accessible by adding a difficulty option, tutorial, colour-blindness option and basic resolution options with full screen and windowed as not everyone will have a large enough screen or powerful computer to run a game in full screen. 

To swing click right mouse and look at any of the purple pipes. 

I hope you enjoy the game, and a big thank you to ProjectSet for hosting the jam and the support that they gave.
